plot: A misanthropic music enthusiast, masked in the shadows, reviews modern and old school pop songs and examines how well, or how badly, they hold up.
title: Todd's Pop Song Reviews
plot_es: A misanthropic music enthusiast, masked in the shadows, reviews modern and old school pop songs and examines how well, or how badly, they hold up.
plot_en: A misanthropic music enthusiast, masked in the shadows, reviews modern and old school pop songs and examines how well, or how badly, they hold up.
